wikipedia_page.main: Willie Wilson (9 October 1941 – November 2001) was a Scottish football goalkeeper who played in the Scottish Football League for Hibernian, Berwick Rangers and Cowdenbeath.Wilson played in a number of European ties for Hibernian, including a famous 5–0 victory against Napoli.He died in November 2001, following major heart surgery.

response: * Willie Wilson (footballer, born 1894) (1894–1956), Scottish footballer, played for Hearts and Cowdenbeath
* Willie Wilson (drummer) (born 1947), member of Quiver; worked with Pink Floyd, Al Stewart
* Willie Wilson (businessman) (born 1948), Chicago businessman, musician, philanthropist, and political candidate
